channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: In a reversal, plans for U.S. natural gas power grow, complicating progress on climate
item.description: A spike in demand for electricity from tech companies competing in the artificial intelligence race is upending forecasts for natural gas-fired power in the U.S., as utilities reconsider it as a major new power source.

item.title: Influencer Tate brothers, who face human trafficking charges in Romania, arrive in the US
Oscar-winner Gene Hackman, wife Betsy Arakawa and their dog were dead for some time, warrant shows
